Module ui
Package engine.bot.ml_bot.network

Class NeuralNetwork

java.lang.Object
engine.bot.ml_bot.network.NeuralNetwork
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class NeuralNetwork extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a neural network, the main component for Q learning.

    • predict

      public double predict(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector input)
      This method predicts an outcome based on the input.
      Parameters:
      input - The input based on which we predict.
      Returns:
      A vector containing the prediction.

    • calculateNodeError

      public double calculateNodeError(List<Double> layerOutputs, int nodeIndex, double nextLayerErrors, List<Perceptron> prevLayerPerceptron, ActivationFunction activationFunction)
      Calculated the Error of the Node based on the Following parameters.
      Parameters:
      layerOutputs - The outputs of all layers.
      nodeIndex - The index of the Node we're accessing.
      nextLayerErrors - The Errors of the next node.
      prevLayerPerceptron - The Perceptron of the previous layer.
      activationFunction - The activation function of the System.
      Returns:
      The Node error (double).

    • train

      public void train(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector state, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector action, org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector nextState, double targetQ, double discountFactor, double learningRate, NeuralNetwork target)
      Training loop for the neural network
      Parameters:
      state - The state of the system.
      action - The action taken.
      nextState - The next state after the action was taken.
      targetQ - The target value.
      discountFactor - The discount factor.
      learningRate - The learning rate
      target - The network to be trained (DeepQ learning)

    • predictMaxQValue

      public double predictMaxQValue(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector nextState)
      Predicts the biggest Q value based on the next state.
      Parameters:
      nextState - The next state.
      Returns:
      The predicted maximum Q value.

      public void backpropagate(org.apache.commons.math3.linear.RealVector input, double outputError, double learningRate)
      Backpropagates through the network (See report).
      Parameters:
      input - The input into the system.
      outputError - The error of the output.
      learningRate - The learning rate.

      Parameters:

      action - The action.
      Returns:
